articles.author: Amala Balakrishner
articles.title: Japan's Nikkei slumps nearly 4% as Trump tariffs due this week keep investors on edge - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific markets plunged Monday ahead of U.S. President Donald Trump's fresh round of tariffs expected later in the week.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets plunged Monday ahead of U.S. President Donald Trump's fresh round of tariffs expected later in the week, with Japan's Nikkei 225 entering correction territory.
Japan's benchmark… [+1613 chars]
